languages.text: "Быть может мне начертать твои слова клинком на его коже, Домин? Похоже ему нужен запрос..." {n}Культистка мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "В письменной форме".
"Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."
languages.original_text: "Быть может мне начертать твои слова клинком на его коже, Домин? Похоже ему нужен запрос..." {n}Культистка мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "В письменной форме".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}The cultist grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."
"Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}The cultist grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

"Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."
"Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

languages.text: «¿Debería grabar tus palabras en su piel con mi espada, Domin? Parece querer...». {n}Kibellah muestra una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «... Una solicitud por escrito».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

traits.locale_text: «¿Debería grabar tus palabras en su piel con mi espada, Domin? Parece querer...». {n}Kibellah muestra una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «... Una solicitud por escrito».

languages.text: “秘者，或许我应该把你的话用匕首刻在他身上，你觉得呢？他似乎需要一份……”{n}绮贝菈露出了阴沉的笑容。{/n}“……书面材料。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

traits.locale_text: “秘者，或许我应该把你的话用匕首刻在他身上，你觉得呢？他似乎需要一份……”{n}绮贝菈露出了阴沉的笑容。{/n}“……书面材料。”

languages.text: 「ドミン、私のブレードで言葉を訂正させなければならないかもしれません。彼は…」{n}キベラは怒ってニヤつく。{/n}「…書面による要請を求めているようです」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン、私のブレードで言葉を訂正させなければならないかもしれません。彼は…」{n}キベラは怒ってニヤつく。{/n}「…書面による要請を求めているようです」

languages.text: « Puisqu'il tient tant à ses écritures, je devrais peut-être graver vos paroles sur sa peau à la pointe de ma lame, Domin ? » {n}Kibellah se fend d'un rictus sinistre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

traits.locale_text: « Puisqu'il tient tant à ses écritures, je devrais peut-être graver vos paroles sur sa peau à la pointe de ma lame, Domin ? » {n}Kibellah se fend d'un rictus sinistre.{/n}

languages.text: "Belki de sözlerini onun derisine kazımalıyım Domin. Sonuçta bu..." {n}Kibellah, karanlık bir ifadeyle sırıtıyor.{/n} "Yazılı bir istek."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de sözlerini onun derisine kazımalıyım Domin. Sonuçta bu..." {n}Kibellah, karanlık bir ifadeyle sırıtıyor.{/n} "Yazılı bir istek."

languages.text: "Vielleicht sollte ich Eure Worte mit meiner Klinge in seine Haut ritzen, Domin? Er braucht offenbar ..." {n}Kibellah grinst unheilvoll.{/n} "... eine schriftliche Anfrage."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I should carve your words into his skin with my blade, Domin? He seems to want..." {n}Kibellah grins darkly.{/n} "...a written request."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht sollte ich Eure Worte mit meiner Klinge in seine Haut ritzen, Domin? Er braucht offenbar ..." {n}Kibellah grinst unheilvoll.{/n} "... eine schriftliche Anfrage."
